mapper.select: select a.no as no, title, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, g_no,o_no,depth, a.user_no as user_no, b.name as name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like #{kwd} or contents like #{kwd}) order by g_no desc , o_no asc limit #{page},5
select no,title,contents,hit,user_no from board where no=#{no}
select no, g_no, o_no, depth from board where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{contents},0,now(),(select ifnull(max(g_no),0)+1 from board b),1,1,#{userNo})
mapper.update: update board set o_no=#{oNo}+1 where g_no=#{gNo} and o_no>=#{oNo}+1;
update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) as boardCount from (select * from board where title like #{kwd} or contents like #{kwd}) as a ;
